item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

try this

if (npcs.npcType == 78) {
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 995, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 5000, c.getId());

idk if the c is possible in npchandler

item.title: Need help coding in npc drops
item.dc:creator: @nico77 nico77
item.description:
@nico77 wrote:

i have found how to receive items when i kill a monster but i cant find out how to make the monster drop the item
this is what it said to receive 5k coins:
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 78) {
c.getItems().addItem(995, 5000);

but when i put getItems(995, 500) i get a compiling error
please help
thanks
